trans-unit.source: Along with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, this Policy provides you with information about the cookies and other similar technologies that are used by all of our websites, mobile apps and other services. We'll review this policy from time to time to make sure it's up-to-date. If we make changes, we'll post the latest version here. When we make significant changes, we'll let you know when you next access our services, or by other communications.

target.mrk: Hizmet artlarmz ve Gizlilik Politikamzla birlikte bu Politika; tm web sitelerimiz, mobil uygulamalarmz ve dier hizmetlerimizde kullanlan erezler ve benzeri teknolojiler hakknda size bilgi salar. Gncel olduundan emin olmak iin bu politikay zaman zaman gzden geireceiz. Deiiklik yapmamz durumunda, en son srm burada yaynlayacaz. nemli deiiklikler yaptmzda ise hizmetlerimize bir sonraki eriiminizde veya dier iletiim kanallar araclyla sizi bilgilendireceiz.

target.mrk: erezlerin ve benzer teknolojilerin kullanmna ilikin rzam nasl geri ekebilirim?

trans-unit.source: When you access our services for the first time on your device, we ask you to agree to us using cookies and similar technologies in line with this policy. If you don't agree to our use of these technologies, or you change your mind at a later date, you can withdraw your consent using the methods set out in this Policy or alternatively, stop using our services.

Bu teknolojileri kullanmamz kabul etmiyorsanz veya daha sonra fikrinizi deitirirseniz bu Politikada belirtilen yntemleri kullanarak rzanz geri ekebilir veya alternatif olarak hizmetlerimizi kullanmay brakabilirsiniz.

These are controlled either by us or directly by third parties acting on our behalf or independently.

Bunlar, ya bizim tarafmzdan ya da bizim admza veya bamsz olarak hareket eden nc taraflarca dorudan kontrol edilir.

file.mtc:id-order: Learn more about cookies and similar technologies

trans-unit.source: Learn more about cookies and similar technologies

seg-source.mrk: Learn more about cookies and similar technologies

target.mrk: erezler ve benzer teknolojiler hakknda daha fazla bilgi edinin

trans-unit.source: What are cookies and similar technologies?

seg-source.mrk: What are cookies and similar technologies?

trans-unit.source:
A cookie is a small text file which is placed on your device (e.g computer or smartphone), via your web browser, at the request of the websites you visit or applications you use and which stores information on your device for a limited period of time. Cookies allow Skyscanner to recognise you and your device each time you visit Skyscanner.
Some of the cookies we use are removed as soon you leave our Website or App, because we don't need to store this information between visits. By contrast, 'persistent' cookies enable our services or tags to recognise you when you make return visits to us, and automatically expire when they reach a specified expiry date unless you delete them earlier. Persistent cookies placed on your device by Skyscanner will never be stored for longer than 2 years from the date of your last visit. There are tools available to check the expiry date on cookies, and this functionality may be provided by your browser.
We may also use similar technologies referred to as 'tags', 'tracking pixels', 'code snippets', 'tracking URLs', 'local storage' and 'scripts' as well as 'software development kits' (SDKs) and 'device identifiers' in our apps. These technologies are implemented on our services and may be used together with text cookies to enable information to be stored on, or transmitted to and from, the device you use to access Skyscanner.
In this policy we collectively refer to all of these app and web technologies as cookies and similar technologies.
We may from time to time add, remove or update the cookies and web technologies we use across our services.

seg-source.mrk:
A cookie is a small text file which is placed on your device (e.g computer or smartphone), via your web browser, at the request of the websites you visit or applications you use and which stores information on your device for a limited period of time. Cookies allow Skyscanner to recognise you and your device each time you visit Skyscanner.
Some of the cookies we use are removed as soon you leave our Website or App, because we don't need to store this information between visits. By contrast, 'persistent' cookies enable our services or tags to recognise you when you make return visits to us, and automatically expire when they reach a specified expiry date unless you delete them earlier. Persistent cookies placed on your device by Skyscanner will never be stored for longer than 2 years from the date of your last visit. There are tools available to check the expiry date on cookies, and this functionality may be provided by your browser.
We may also use similar technologies referred to as 'tags', 'tracking pixels', 'code snippets', 'tracking URLs', 'local storage' and 'scripts' as well as 'software development kits' (SDKs) and 'device identifiers' in our apps. These technologies are implemented on our services and may be used together with text cookies to enable information to be stored on, or transmitted to and from, the device you use to access Skyscanner.
In this policy we collectively refer to all of these app and web technologies as cookies and similar technologies.
We may from time to time add, remove or update the cookies and web technologies we use across our services.

target.mrk:
erez, ziyaret ettiiniz web sitelerinin veya kullandnz uygulamalarn talebi zerine, web taraycnz araclyla cihaznza (r. bilgisayar veya akll telefon) yerletirilen ve snrl bir sre boyunca cihaznzda bilgi saklayan kk bir metin dosyasdr. erezler, Skyscanner' her ziyaret ettiinizde Skyscanner'n sizi ve cihaznz tanmasna olanak tanr.
Kullandmz baz erezler, Web Sitemizden veya Uygulamamzdan ayrldnz anda silinir, nk ziyaretler arasnda bu bilgileri saklamamz gerekmez. Buna karlk, "kalc" erezler, bizi tekrar ziyaret ettiinizde hizmetlerimizin veya etiketlerimizin sizi tanmasn salar ve siz onlar daha nce silmediiniz srece belirlenen son kullanma tarihine ulatklarnda otomatik olarak sona erer (silinir). Skyscanner tarafndan cihaznza yerletirilen kalc erezler, son ziyaret tarihinizden itibaren asla 2 yldan uzun sre saklanmayacaktr. erezlerin son kullanma tarihini kontrol etmek iin eitli aralar mevcuttur ve bu ilevler taraycnz tarafndan salanabilir.
Ayrca uygulamalarmzda "etiketler", "izleme pikselleri", "kod paracklar", "izleme URL'leri", "yerel depolama" ve "komut dosyalar" ile "yazlm gelitirme kitleri" ("SDK'lar") ve "cihaz tanmlayclar" olarak adlandrlan benzer teknolojileri de kullanabiliriz. Bu teknolojiler hizmetlerimizde uygulanr ve Skyscanner'a erimek iin kullandnz cihazda bilgilerin saklanmasn veya bu cihaza/cihazdan bilgilerin iletilmesini salamak amacyla metin erezleriyle birlikte kullanlabilir.
Bu politikada, tm bu uygulama ve web teknolojilerini topluca "erezler ve benzer teknolojiler" olarak adlandryoruz.
Hizmetlerimizde kullandmz erezleri ve web teknolojilerini zaman zaman ekleyebilir, kaldrabilir veya gncelleyebiliriz.

trans-unit.source: You can view the main cookies and similar technologies we use at the date of this Policy in the What cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? section of this Policy.

seg-source.mrk: You can view the main cookies and similar technologies we use at the date of this Policy in the What cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? section of this Policy.

target.mrk: Bu Politika tarihi itibaryla kullandmz balca erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri, bu Politikann Hangi erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri kullanyoruz ve bunlar nasl devre d brakabilirsiniz? blmnde inceleyebilirsiniz.

seg-source.mrk: Purpose of essential cookies or similar technologies

trans-unit.source: These cookies and similar technologies collect essential data in order to ensure that the Website and App function properly. You cannot opt out of these Cookies, because without them Skyscanner wouldn't work. Skyscanner uses these for the following purposes:

seg-source.mrk: These cookies and similar technologies collect essential data in order to ensure that the Website and App function properly. You cannot opt out of these Cookies, because without them Skyscanner wouldn't work. Skyscanner uses these for the following purposes:

trans-unit.source: Purpose of improved experience (analytics) cookies or similar technologies

seg-source.mrk: Purpose of improved experience (analytics) cookies or similar technologies

target.mrk: Gelitirilmi deneyim (analitik) erezlerinin veya benzer teknolojilerin amac

trans-unit.source:
Analytics cookies and similar technologies allow Skyscanner to collect information about how visitors interact with our Platforms. Skyscanner uses the information collected from these analytics cookies and similar technologies to inform reports on our Platforms' usage. This information will assist Skyscanner in measuring and improving the performance of our Platforms.
Skyscanner uses analytics cookies and similar technologies to collect information about how individuals engage with our Platforms. This information is used for reporting to assist us in improving the Skyscanner service, analyse and measure product improvements and guide our product development teams based on your activities.
Your data is stored or accessed via cookies and similar technologies that are used to optimise your experience of our Platforms. Without them, our Platforms would feel a lot less easy to use and you would not benefit from the best experience.These cookies and similar technologies help improve your experience by allowing us to:

Without them, our Platforms would feel a lot less easy to use and you would not benefit from the best experience.These cookies and similar technologies help improve your experience by allowing us to:

target.mrk:
Analitik erezler ve benzer teknolojiler, Skyscanner'n ziyaretilerin Platformlarmzla nasl etkileime girdiine dair bilgi toplamasn salar. Skyscanner, bu analitik erezlerden ve benzer teknolojilerden toplanan bilgileri, Platformlarmzn kullanmna ilikin raporlara kaynak oluturmak iin kullanr. Bu bilgiler, Platformlarmzn performansn lme ve iyiletirme konusunda Skyscanner'a yardmc olacaktr.
Skyscanner, bireylerin Platformlarmzla nasl etkileim kurduu hakknda bilgi toplamak iin analitik erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri kullanr. Bu bilgiler; Skyscanner hizmetini gelitirmemize yardmc olacak raporlamalar yapmak, rn iyiletirmelerini analiz edip lmek ve aktivitelerinize dayal olarak rn gelitirme ekiplerimize yol gstermek amacyla kullanlr.
Platformlarmzdaki deneyiminizi optimize etmek iin kullanlan erezler ve benzer teknolojiler araclyla verileriniz saklanr veya verilerinize eriilir. Bunlar olmadan, Platformlarmzn kullanm ok daha zorlar ve en iyi deneyimden yararlanamazsnz. Bu erezler ve benzer teknolojiler, unlar yapmamza olanak tanyarak deneyiminizi iyiletirmeye yardmc olur:

trans-unit.source: recognise you when you access our Platforms from different devices, to provide you with a better experience; and

You can opt out of the use of these Cookies on your device by following the instructions in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy.

You can opt out of the use of these Cookies on your device by following the instructions in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy.

Bu Politikann erezlerin ve benzer teknolojilerin kullanmna ilikin rzam nasl geri ekebilirim? blmndeki talimatlar izleyerek cihaznzda bu erezlerin kullanmn devre d brakabilirsiniz.

trans-unit.source: Purpose of personalised adverts (including third party ad solutions) cookies or similar technologies

seg-source.mrk: Purpose of personalised adverts (including third party ad solutions) cookies or similar technologies

target.mrk: Kiiselletirilmi reklam erezlerinin (nc taraf reklam zmleri dhil) veya benzer teknolojilerin amac

trans-unit.source:
When you are opted-in to ads or offers personalisation we may also use information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to show you personalised ads, marketing, offers and promotions on Skyscanner, or to send you electronic direct marketing communications where you have opted in to receive these. For example, where you book a hotel using our Website or App or redirect from our Website or App to make a booking with a Travel Provider, we may use the information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to personalise the ads we show you or to send you personalised marketing communications relevant to your booking based on information like your destination, the time you are travelling, the services you've selected or which travel supplier you are travelling with. We may also use this information to provide you with relevant information about the destination you are travelling to such as destination information, up-to-date weather information or to request reviews and recommendations about the places you have visited.
These cookies and similar technologies help Skyscanner and our marketing service providers to improve and measure the success of some advertising campaigns to ensure that you are only shown ads which are relevant to you and to avoid showing you ads you have already seen.
You can opt-out of your information being used by Skyscanner for ads and offers personalisation by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.
When you opt out, we'll stop using these cookies to learn more about you, so you won't see as personalised ads, offers or marketing while you are on the Website or the App when you opt out. However, you'll continue to see advertising or offers when you're on the Website or the App based on contextual information on the page or screen you are viewing. For example, if you have searched for a flight to London then you may be shown an advert relating to a hotel in London within that webpage.
You can find out more about the advertising on Skyscanner in the How is your information used for advertising? section of the Policy.
We use technologies to personalise ads in certain platforms. When you are opted-in to ads personalisation on these platforms, we transfer information such as the travel you have searched for or purchased using Skyscanner, the dates you want to travel and the features you have interacted with to providers such as Facebook, Google and TikTok (Third Party Ad Solutions) for the purpose of customising, optimising and improving the relevance of the advertisements you see across the web via the Third Party Ad Solution's advertising network.
When we transfer information to Third Party Ad Solution providers like Facebook, Google and TikTok we do so using the tools they provide. They may in addition use that information to personalise features and content (including advertisements and recommendations) you see on their networks, to optimise delivery of advertisements and for research and development purposes in accordance with their policies (see for example the Facebook Privacy Policy, and TikTok Privacy Policy).
The majority of these adverts will be personalised to make them relevant to you and will fall into two different categories. Firstly, adverts that are personalised for you based on information collected by us or by Third Party Ad Solutions whilst you use our services, such as your general location (by city or country) and your Skyscanner searches or booking history (Skyscanner-related Information). So, for example, if you've booked a flight to Rome, you'll see adverts about hotels in Rome, rather than hotels in Paris (Paris is lovely, but this could be a bit annoying!). Skyscanner-related Information will never include your name, contact details or other information that would enable you to be identified in the offline world. Secondly, adverts that are personalised for you based on information that we have no visibility or control over, and which is instead collected from you by non-Skyscanner Platforms when you have been using other non-Skyscanner websites or platforms. (non-Skyscanner Platforms). Collectively, we refer to these as interest-based advertisements.
The information required to deliver these interest-based advertisements will be stored by non-Skyscanner Platforms alongside your IP address and/or a cookie ID, so that you can be served the adverts without the non-Skyscanner Platforms needing to store any information that would enable you to be identified in the offline world, like your name or address.
When you are opted-in to ads personalisation we may also use information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to show you personalised ads, marketing and promotions on Skyscanner, or to send you communications where you have opted in to receive these. For example, where you book a flight using Skyscanner or redirect from Skyscanner to make a booking on one of our partner sites, we may use the information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to personalise the ads we show you or to send you personalised marketing communications relevant to your booking based on information like your destination, the time you are travelling, the services you've selected or which travel supplier you are travelling with.
You can opt-out of your information being used for ads personalisation by non-Skyscanner Platforms by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.
When you opt out of ads personalisation, this will stop your information being used for advertising purposes by any of the Third Party Ad Solutions we use. You will not receive personalised advertisements from those non-Skyscanner Platforms on the Skyscanner Website or App, or elsewhere as you move around the web. You will still receive advertisements, which will not be customised to your interests. Please note that any such opt-out of interest-based adverts will take some time to reflect within your browsing sessions, as Skyscanner will need to facilitate such a request.

seg-source.mrk:
When you are opted-in to ads or offers personalisation we may also use information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to show you personalised ads, marketing, offers and promotions on Skyscanner, or to send you electronic direct marketing communications where you have opted in to receive these. For example, where you book a hotel using our Website or App or redirect from our Website or App to make a booking with a Travel Provider, we may use the information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to personalise the ads we show you or to send you personalised marketing communications relevant to your booking based on information like your destination, the time you are travelling, the services you've selected or which travel supplier you are travelling with. We may also use this information to provide you with relevant information about the destination you are travelling to such as destination information, up-to-date weather information or to request reviews and recommendations about the places you have visited.
These cookies and similar technologies help Skyscanner and our marketing service providers to improve and measure the success of some advertising campaigns to ensure that you are only shown ads which are relevant to you and to avoid showing you ads you have already seen.
You can opt-out of your information being used by Skyscanner for ads and offers personalisation by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.
When you opt out, we'll stop using these cookies to learn more about you, so you won't see as personalised ads, offers or marketing while you are on the Website or the App when you opt out. However, you'll continue to see advertising or offers when you're on the Website or the App based on contextual information on the page or screen you are viewing. For example, if you have searched for a flight to London then you may be shown an advert relating to a hotel in London within that webpage.
You can find out more about the advertising on Skyscanner in the How is your information used for advertising? section of the Policy.
We use technologies to personalise ads in certain platforms. When you are opted-in to ads personalisation on these platforms, we transfer information such as the travel you have searched for or purchased using Skyscanner, the dates you want to travel and the features you have interacted with to providers such as Facebook, Google and TikTok (Third Party Ad Solutions) for the purpose of customising, optimising and improving the relevance of the advertisements you see across the web via the Third Party Ad Solution's advertising network.
When we transfer information to Third Party Ad Solution providers like Facebook, Google and TikTok we do so using the tools they provide. They may in addition use that information to personalise features and content (including advertisements and recommendations) you see on their networks, to optimise delivery of advertisements and for research and development purposes in accordance with their policies (see for example the Facebook Privacy Policy, and TikTok Privacy Policy).
The majority of these adverts will be personalised to make them relevant to you and will fall into two different categories. Firstly, adverts that are personalised for you based on information collected by us or by Third Party Ad Solutions whilst you use our services, such as your general location (by city or country) and your Skyscanner searches or booking history (Skyscanner-related Information). So, for example, if you've booked a flight to Rome, you'll see adverts about hotels in Rome, rather than hotels in Paris (Paris is lovely, but this could be a bit annoying!). Skyscanner-related Information will never include your name, contact details or other information that would enable you to be identified in the offline world. Secondly, adverts that are personalised for you based on information that we have no visibility or control over, and which is instead collected from you by non-Skyscanner Platforms when you have been using other non-Skyscanner websites or platforms. (non-Skyscanner Platforms). Collectively, we refer to these as interest-based advertisements.
The information required to deliver these interest-based advertisements will be stored by non-Skyscanner Platforms alongside your IP address and/or a cookie ID, so that you can be served the adverts without the non-Skyscanner Platforms needing to store any information that would enable you to be identified in the offline world, like your name or address.
When you are opted-in to ads personalisation we may also use information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to show you personalised ads, marketing and promotions on Skyscanner, or to send you communications where you have opted in to receive these. For example, where you book a flight using Skyscanner or redirect from Skyscanner to make a booking on one of our partner sites, we may use the information we collect via cookies and similar technologies to personalise the ads we show you or to send you personalised marketing communications relevant to your booking based on information like your destination, the time you are travelling, the services you've selected or which travel supplier you are travelling with.
You can opt-out of your information being used for ads personalisation by non-Skyscanner Platforms by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.
When you opt out of ads personalisation, this will stop your information being used for advertising purposes by any of the Third Party Ad Solutions we use. You will not receive personalised advertisements from those non-Skyscanner Platforms on the Skyscanner Website or App, or elsewhere as you move around the web. You will still receive advertisements, which will not be customised to your interests. Please note that any such opt-out of interest-based adverts will take some time to reflect within your browsing sessions, as Skyscanner will need to facilitate such a request.

target.mrk:
Reklam veya teklif kiiselletirmesine onay verdiinizde; erezler ve benzer teknolojiler araclyla topladmz bilgileri, size Skyscanner zerinde kiiselletirilmi reklamlar, pazarlama ierikleri, teklifler ve promosyonlar gstermek veya almay kabul ettiyseniz size elektronik dorudan pazarlama iletiimleri gndermek iin de kullanabiliriz. rnein Web Sitemizi veya Uygulamamz kullanarak bir otel rezervasyonu yaptnzda ya da bir Seyahat Hizmeti Salaycs ile rezervasyon yapmak zere Web Sitemizden veya Uygulamamzdan ynlendirildiinizde, size gsterdiimiz reklamlar kiiselletirmek veya var noktanz, seyahat zamannz, setiiniz hizmetler ya da hangi seyahat hizmeti salaycsyla seyahat ettiiniz gibi bilgilere dayanarak rezervasyonunuzla ilgili kiiselletirilmi pazarlama iletiimleri gndermek iin erezler ve benzer teknolojiler araclyla topladmz bilgileri kullanabiliriz. Bu bilgileri ayrca, seyahat ettiiniz var noktasyla ilgili size var noktas hakknda bilgiler, gncel hava durumu bilgileri gibi ilgili ierikler sunmak veya ziyaret ettiiniz yerler hakknda yorum ve neriler istemek amacyla da kullanabiliriz.
Bu erezler ve benzer teknolojiler, size yalnzca ilgili reklamlarn gsterilmesini salamak ve zaten grm olduunuz reklamlarn tekrar gsterilmesini nlemek amacyla baz reklam kampanyalarnn baarsn lmek ve iyiletirmek konusunda Skyscanner'a ve pazarlama hizmeti salayclarmza yardmc olur.
Aada yer alan bu Politikann erezlerin ve benzer teknolojilerin kullanmna ilikin rzam nasl geri ekebilirim? blmndeki admlar izleyerek, bilgilerinizin Skyscanner tarafndan reklam ve teklif kiiselletirmesi amacyla kullanlmasn devre d brakabilirsiniz.
Bunu yaptnzda, hakknzda daha fazla bilgi edinmek iin bu erezleri kullanmay brakrz; bylece Web Sitesi veya Uygulama zerindeyken eskisi kadar kiiselletirilmi reklamlar, teklifler veya pazarlama ierikleri grmezsiniz. Ancak, grntlemekte olduunuz sayfa veya ekrandaki balamsal bilgilere dayal olarak Web Sitesi veya Uygulama zerindeyken reklam veya teklif grmeye devam edersiniz. rnein, Londra'ya bir uu aradysanz, o web sayfas ierisinde Londra'daki bir otelle ilgili bir reklam gsterilebilir.
Skyscanner zerindeki reklamlar hakknda daha fazla bilgiyi, Politikann Bilgileriniz reklamclk iin nasl kullanlr? blmnde bulabilirsiniz.
Belirli platformlarda reklamlar kiiselletirmek iin teknolojiler kullanyoruz. Bu platformlarda reklam kiiselletirmesine onay verdiinizde; Skyscanner' kullanarak aradnz veya satn aldnz seyahat, seyahat etmek istediiniz tarihler ve etkileimde bulunduunuz zellikler gibi bilgileri, nc Taraf Reklam zm'nn reklam a araclyla web genelinde grdnz reklamlarn alaka dzeyini zelletirmek, optimize etmek ve iyiletirmek amacyla Facebook, Google ve TikTok ("nc Taraf Reklam zmleri") gibi hizmet salayclara aktarrz.
Facebook, Google ve TikTok gibi nc Taraf Reklam zm hizmet salayclarna bilgi aktardmzda, bunu onlarn salad aralar kullanarak yaparz. Buna ek olarak onlar da bu bilgileri; alarnda grdnz zellikleri ve ierii (reklamlar ve neriler dhil) kiiselletirmek, reklamlarn sunumunu optimize etmek ve kendi politikalar uyarnca (rnein Facebook Gizlilik Politikas ve TikTok Gizlilik Politikas'na bakn) aratrma ve gelitirme amalar dorultusunda kullanabilirler.
Bu reklamlarn ounluu, sizinle alakal hle getirilmek zere kiiselletirilir ve iki farkl kategoriye ayrlr. Birincisi; genel konumunuz (ehir veya lke baznda) ve Skyscanner aramalarnz veya rezervasyon gemiiniz ("Skyscanner ile likili Bilgiler") gibi hizmetlerimizi kullanrken bizim tarafmzdan veya nc Taraf Reklam zmleri tarafndan toplanan bilgilere dayal olarak sizin iin kiiselletirilen reklamlardr. rnein Roma'ya bir uu rezervasyonu yaptysanz Paris'teki oteller yerine Roma'daki otellerle ilgili reklamlar grrsnz (Paris her ne kadar ho olsa da bu biraz can skc olabilir!). Skyscanner ile likili Bilgiler; adnz, iletiim bilgilerinizi veya evrim d dnyada kimliinizin belirlenmesini salayacak dier bilgileri asla iermez. kincisi; zerinde hibir grnrlmz veya kontrolmz olmayan ve bunun yerine siz dier Skyscanner d web sitelerini veya platformlarn ("Skyscanner D Platformlar") kullanrken bu platformlar tarafndan sizden toplanan bilgilere dayal olarak sizin iin kiiselletirilen reklamlardr. Bunlar topluca "ilgi alanna dayal" reklamlar olarak adlandryoruz.
Bu ilgi alanna dayal reklamlar sunmak iin gereken bilgiler, Skyscanner d Platformlar tarafndan IP adresiniz ve/veya bir erez kimlii ile birlikte saklanr; bylece Skyscanner d Platformlarn adnz veya adresiniz gibi evrim d dnyada kimliinizin belirlenmesini salayacak herhangi bir bilgiyi saklamasna gerek kalmadan size reklam sunulabilir.
Reklam kiiselletirmesine onay verdiinizde, erezler ve benzer teknolojiler araclyla topladmz bilgileri size Skyscanner zerinde kiiselletirilmi reklamlar, pazarlama ierikleri ve promosyonlar gstermek veya bunlar almay kabul ettiyseniz size iletiimler gndermek iin de kullanabiliriz. rnein Skyscanner' kullanarak bir uu rezervasyonu yaptnzda veya i orta sitelerimizden birinde rezervasyon yapmak zere Skyscanner'dan ynlendirildiinizde; size gsterdiimiz reklamlar kiiselletirmek veya var noktanz, seyahat zamannz, setiiniz hizmetler ya da hangi seyahat hizmeti salaycsyla seyahat ettiiniz gibi bilgilere dayanarak rezervasyonunuzla ilgili kiiselletirilmi pazarlama iletiimleri gndermek iin erezler ve benzer teknolojiler araclyla topladmz bilgileri kullanabiliriz.
Aada yer alan bu Politikann erezlerin ve benzer teknolojilerin kullanmna ilikin rzam nasl geri ekebilirim? blmndeki admlar izleyerek bilgilerinizin Skyscanner d Platformlar tarafndan reklam kiiselletirmesi amacyla kullanlmasn devre d brakabilirsiniz.
Reklam kiiselletirmesini devre d braktnzda, bu durum bilgilerinizin kullandmz herhangi bir nc Taraf Reklam zm tarafndan reklam amacyla kullanlmasn durduracaktr. Skyscanner Web Sitesinde veya Uygulamasnda ya da web zerinde gezinirken baka yerlerde bu Skyscanner d Platformlardan kiiselletirilmi reklamlar almazsnz. lgi alanlarnza gre zelletirilmemi reklamlar grmeye devam edersiniz. Skyscanner'n bu tr bir talebi ileme koymas gerekeceinden ilgi alanna dayal reklamlardan vazgeme ileminin internet tarayc oturumlarnza yansmasnn biraz zaman alacan ltfen unutmayn.

trans-unit.source: Who controls these cookies and similar technologies?

seg-source.mrk: Who controls these cookies and similar technologies?

target.mrk: Bu erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri kim kontrol ediyor?

trans-unit.source: The cookies and similar technologies on our services are controlled either by us directly or by third parties acting on our behalf. There are also some cookies and similar technologies which we've implemented for advertising purposes that are controlled by independent third parties. You can find out more about these third parties and how to opt-out of their cookies in the What Cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? section of this Policy.

seg-source.mrk: The cookies and similar technologies on our services are controlled either by us directly or by third parties acting on our behalf. There are also some cookies and similar technologies which we've implemented for advertising purposes that are controlled by independent third parties. You can find out more about these third parties and how to opt-out of their cookies in the What Cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? section of this Policy.

target.mrk: Hizmetlerimizdeki erezler ve benzer teknolojiler ya dorudan bizim tarafmzdan ya da bizim admza hareket eden nc taraflarca kontrol edilir. Ayrca, bamsz nc taraflarca kontrol edilen reklam amal baz erezler ve benzer teknolojiler de uygularz. Bu nc taraflar ve erezlerin nasl devre d braklaca hakknda daha fazla bilgiyi bu Politikann Hangi erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri kullanyoruz ve bunlar nasl devre d brakabilirsiniz? blmnde bulabilirsiniz.

trans-unit.source: Adverts you might see while using non-Skyscanner Platforms

seg-source.mrk: Adverts you might see while using non-Skyscanner Platforms

target.mrk: Skyscanner dndaki platformlar kullanrken grebileceiniz reklamlar

trans-unit.source:
You might see personalised adverts for Skyscanner or selected Skyscanner partners once you've left the Skyscanner Website or App and are using non-Skyscanner platforms. These adverts may be personalised and served to you based on the information Skyscanner and non-Skyscanner Platforms have collected about you. For example, if you have searched for a flight from Edinburgh to London on Skyscanner or another non-Skyscanner Platform, and we have asked non-Skyscanner Platforms to show our advert to individuals that have expressed an interest in travelling to London, the non-Skyscanner Platforms may categorise you within that group and serve you our advert. Sometimes personal data like your email address or phone number is shared with non-Skyscanner Platforms to enable your data to be linked with other information they collect, to create custom audiences or deliver targeted ads.
You can opt-out of your information being used for ads personalisation on non-Skyscanner Platforms by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.

seg-source.mrk:
You might see personalised adverts for Skyscanner or selected Skyscanner partners once you've left the Skyscanner Website or App and are using non-Skyscanner platforms. These adverts may be personalised and served to you based on the information Skyscanner and non-Skyscanner Platforms have collected about you. For example, if you have searched for a flight from Edinburgh to London on Skyscanner or another non-Skyscanner Platform, and we have asked non-Skyscanner Platforms to show our advert to individuals that have expressed an interest in travelling to London, the non-Skyscanner Platforms may categorise you within that group and serve you our advert. Sometimes personal data like your email address or phone number is shared with non-Skyscanner Platforms to enable your data to be linked with other information they collect, to create custom audiences or deliver targeted ads.
You can opt-out of your information being used for ads personalisation on non-Skyscanner Platforms by following the steps set out in the How can I withdraw my consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies? section of this Policy below.

target.mrk:
Skyscanner Web Sitesinden veya Uygulamasndan ayrldktan sonra Skyscanner dndaki platformlar kullanrken Skyscanner veya seili Skyscanner i ortaklar iin kiiselletirilmi reklamlar grebilirsiniz. Bu reklamlar, Skyscanner'n ve Skyscanner dndaki platformlarn sizin hakknzda toplad bilgiler temel alnarak kiiselletirilebilir ve size sunulabilir. rnein, Skyscanner'da veya Skyscanner dndaki baka bir platformda Edinburgh'dan Londra'ya bir uu aramas yaptysanz ve Skyscanner dndaki platformlardan, Londra'ya seyahat etmekle ilgilenen kiilere reklammz gstermelerini istediysek Skyscanner dndaki platformlar sizi bu grup iinde kategorize edebilir ve size reklammz sunabilir. Bazen e-posta adresiniz veya telefon numaranz gibi kiisel veriler, verilerinizin toplanan dier bilgilerle ilikilendirilmesini salamak, zel hedef kitleler oluturmak veya hedefli reklamlar sunmak amacyla Skyscanner dndaki platformlarla paylalr.
Bu Politikann aadaki erezlerin ve benzer teknolojilerin kullanmna ilikin rzam nasl geri ekebilirim? blmnde belirtilen admlar izleyerek Skyscanner dndaki platformlarda reklamlarn kiiselletirilmesi iin bilgilerinizin kullanlmasn devre d brakabilirsiniz.

trans-unit.source: If you have any questions regarding this Policy or would like more information about the cookies used on our Website or App, please contact us.

seg-source.mrk: If you have any questions regarding this Policy or would like more information about the cookies used on our Website or App, please contact us.

target.mrk: Bu Politika ile ilgili herhangi bir sorunuz varsa veya Web Sitemizde ya da Uygulamamzda kullanlan erezler hakknda daha fazla bilgi edinmek istiyorsanz ltfen bizimle iletiime gein.

file.mtc:id-order: Opt-out via Skyscanner privacy setting in app or on web

trans-unit.source: Opt-out via Skyscanner privacy setting in app or on web

seg-source.mrk: Opt-out via Skyscanner privacy setting in app or on web

target.mrk: Uygulamada veya web'de Skyscanner gizlilik ayar araclyla devre d brakma

trans-unit.source:
The most effective way to manage Cookies and similar technologies on Skyscanner is to use the privacy controls we provide in our product.
You can control the non-essential Cookies and similar technologies that are used on your device by visiting https://www.skyscanner.net/privacy-settings on web or via the Privacy Settings menu in the Skyscanner App. These settings enable you to opt-out or opt-in to our use of the non-essential Cookies and similar technologies we use to improve your experience or to those that we use to personalise the offers or the advertisements you see.

seg-source.mrk:
The most effective way to manage Cookies and similar technologies on Skyscanner is to use the privacy controls we provide in our product.
You can control the non-essential Cookies and similar technologies that are used on your device by visiting https://www.skyscanner.net/privacy-settings on web or via the Privacy Settings menu in the Skyscanner App. These settings enable you to opt-out or opt-in to our use of the non-essential Cookies and similar technologies we use to improve your experience or to those that we use to personalise the offers or the advertisements you see.

target.mrk:
Skyscanner'da erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri ynetmenin en etkili yolu, rnmzde sunduumuz gizlilik kontrollerini kullanmaktr.
Cihaznzda kullanlan temel olmayan erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri, web'de https://www.skyscanner.net/privacy-settings adresini ziyaret ederek veya Skyscanner Uygulamasndaki Gizlilik Ayarlar mensnden kontrol edebilirsiniz. Bu ayarlar, deneyiminizi iyiletirmek iin kullandmz temel olmayan erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri veya grdnz teklifleri ya da reklamlar kiiselletirmek iin kullandmz erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri kullanmay kabul etmenize veya reddetmenize olanak tanr.

trans-unit.source:
Another way to opt out of Cookies and similar technologies is via the settings of the browser or device you are using to access our services. Internet browsers such as Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Opera and Edge have settings that allow you to control the way your information is collected and shared. Typically, these browsers allow you to view all the Cookies they are storing on your device, delete your cache of cookies, and adjust your preferences for future collection. Guides on how to access and use such functionality are available at https://www.aboutcookies.org.
The downside of using browser or device settings to withdraw your consent is that it will have the effect of disabling many of the Cookies and similar technologies that are essential to enabling our services to function the impact of this is that some or all of the features and functionality we offer may stop working. Because of this, we would recommend taking a more targeted approach to withdrawing your consent. For example, if you wanted stop Cookies and similar technologies being used for the purposes of serving you interest-based advertisements, then instead of blocking all Cookies, you could instead opt-out of these via the Privacy Settings in Skyscanner referred to above.
Many browsers and other third parties provide specialised ad-blocking software, 'extensions' or tools that enable you to block the use of all cookies for advertising purposes. If you access our services from an iOS or Android device, you can also control how your information is used for certain purposes such as tracking and advertising via your device settings.
You can also find helpful information about how to manage and limit your exposure to online interest-based advertising more generally across the web at http://optout.aboutads.info, http://optout.networkadvertising.org and http://youronlinechoices.eu. You can use these services to opt-out of the majority of interest-based advertising used by us as well as other websites.

seg-source.mrk:
Another way to opt out of Cookies and similar technologies is via the settings of the browser or device you are using to access our services. Internet browsers such as Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Opera and Edge have settings that allow you to control the way your information is collected and shared. Typically, these browsers allow you to view all the Cookies they are storing on your device, delete your cache of cookies, and adjust your preferences for future collection. Guides on how to access and use such functionality are available at https://www.aboutcookies.org.
The downside of using browser or device settings to withdraw your consent is that it will have the effect of disabling many of the Cookies and similar technologies that are essential to enabling our services to function the impact of this is that some or all of the features and functionality we offer may stop working. Because of this, we would recommend taking a more targeted approach to withdrawing your consent. For example, if you wanted stop Cookies and similar technologies being used for the purposes of serving you interest-based advertisements, then instead of blocking all Cookies, you could instead opt-out of these via the Privacy Settings in Skyscanner referred to above.
Many browsers and other third parties provide specialised ad-blocking software, 'extensions' or tools that enable you to block the use of all cookies for advertising purposes. If you access our services from an iOS or Android device, you can also control how your information is used for certain purposes such as tracking and advertising via your device settings.
You can also find helpful information about how to manage and limit your exposure to online interest-based advertising more generally across the web at http://optout.aboutads.info, http://optout.networkadvertising.org and http://youronlinechoices.eu. You can use these services to opt-out of the majority of interest-based advertising used by us as well as other websites.

target.mrk:
erezleri ve benzer teknolojileri devre d brakmann bir baka yolu da hizmetlerimize erimek iin kullandnz taraycnn veya cihazn ayarlardr. Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Opera ve Edge gibi internet tarayclar, bilgilerinizin toplanma ve paylalma eklini kontrol etmenizi salayan ayarlara sahiptir. Bu tarayclar genellikle cihaznzda depoladklar tm erezleri grntlemenize, erez nbelleinizi silmenize ve gelecekteki toplama ilemleri iin tercihlerinizi ayarlamanza olanak tanr. Bu tr ilevlere nasl erieceiniz ve bunlar nasl kullanacanzla ilgili klavuzlar https://www.aboutcookies.org adresinde bulunabilir.
Rzanz geri ekmek iin tarayc veya cihaz ayarlarn kullanmann dezavantaj, hizmetlerimizin almasn salamak iin gerekli olan erezlerin ve benzer teknolojilerin ounu devre d brakacak olmasdr. Bunun sonucunda, sunduumuz zelliklerin ve ilevlerin bir ksm veya tamamn almay durdurabilir. Bu nedenle, rzanz geri ekmek iin daha ok hedef gzeten bir yaklam benimsemenizi neririz. rnein, erezlerin ve benzer teknolojilerin, ilgi alannza dayal reklamlar sunmak amacyla kullanlmasn durdurmak istiyorsanz tm erezleri engellemek yerine yukarda belirtilen Skyscanner Gizlilik Ayarlar araclyla bunlar devre d brakabilirsiniz.
Birok tarayc ve dier nc taraflar, reklam amal tm erezlerin kullanmn engellemenizi salayan zel reklam engelleme yazlmlar, "uzantlar" veya aralar salar. Hizmetlerimize bir iOS veya Android cihazdan eriiyorsanz bilgilerinizin izleme ve reklam gibi belirli amalarla nasl kullanldn cihaz ayarlarnzdan da kontrol edebilirsiniz.
Ayrca, internette ilgi alanna dayal evrim ii reklamlara web'de daha genel olarak ne kadar maruz kalacanz ynetme ve snrlama hakknda faydal bilgileri http://optout.aboutads.info, http://optout.networkadvertising.org ve http://youronlinechoices.eu sayfalarnda bulabilirsiniz. Bu hizmetleri, tarafmzca ve dier web siteleri tarafndan kullanlan ilgi alanna dayal reklamlarn ounu devre d brakmak iin kullanabilirsiniz.

trans-unit.source: We'll only ever use cookies and similar technologies - such as tags and pixels - for the purposes set out in this Cookie Policy (Policy) and will never use them to inflate or alter the prices you see when searching on Skyscanner or to manipulate demand.

seg-source.mrk: We'll only ever use cookies and similar technologies - such as tags and pixels - for the purposes set out in this Cookie Policy (Policy) and will never use them to inflate or alter the prices you see when searching on Skyscanner or to manipulate demand.

target.mrk: erezleri ve etiketler ile pikseller gibi benzer teknolojileri yalnzca bu erez Politikasnda ("Politika") belirtilen amalar dorultusunda kullanrz ve asla Skyscanner'da arama yaparken grdnz fiyatlar iirmek veya deitirmek ya da talebi maniple etmek amacyla kullanmayz.

trans-unit.source: Skyscanner uses cookies and similar technologies to help provide services to you, learn more about them and your rights in relation to them.

seg-source.mrk: Skyscanner uses cookies and similar technologies to help provide services to you, learn more about them and your rights in relation to them.

target.mrk: Skyscanner, size hizmet sunmaya yardmc olacak erezler ve benzer teknolojiler kullanr. Bunlarn ve bunlarla ilgili haklarnzn ne olduu konusunda daha fazla bilgi edinin.

file.mtc:id-order: What cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? (anchor)
What cookies and similar technologies do we use and how can you opt out of them? (content)

trans-unit.source: The following table set out the Skyscanner and third-party essential cookies in use at the date of this Policy. The Cookies will vary depending on the device / platform you are using.

trans-unit.source: The following table sets out the cookies used at the date of this Policy to improve your experience and allow Skyscanner to compile reports on Website and App usage. The cookies used will vary depending on the device and/or platform you are using. Where available, we have included a link to opt-out of the use of third-party cookies and on an individual level. You can do that by visiting the link in the table on each device you use to access Skyscanner.

seg-source.mrk: The following table sets out the cookies used at the date of this Policy to improve your experience and allow Skyscanner to compile reports on Website and App usage. The cookies used will vary depending on the device and/or platform you are using. Where available, we have included a link to opt-out of the use of third-party cookies and on an individual level. You can do that by visiting the link in the table on each device you use to access Skyscanner.

target.mrk: Aadaki tabloda, bu Politikann hazrland tarihte deneyiminizi iyiletirmek ve Skyscanner'n Web Sitesi ve Uygulama kullanm hakknda raporlar derlemesine olanak tanmak iin kullanlan erezler gsterilmektedir. Kullanlan erezler, kullanmakta olduunuz cihaza ve/veya platforma bal olarak farkllk gsterecektir. Uygun olduu durumlarda, nc taraf erezlerinin kullanmn ve bireysel dzeyde kullanm devre d brakmak iin bir balant ekleriz. Skyscanner'a erimek iin kullandnz her cihazda tablodaki balanty ziyaret ederek bu ilemi yapabilirsiniz.

seg-source.mrk: Used to control display of Branch app banner

target.mrk: Kilitlenme analizlerini ve uygulamann farkl srmlerinin benimsenmesine ilikin verileri toplamak iin kullanlr

trans-unit.source: Personalised Advertising cookies and similar technologies

target.mrk: Kiiselletirilmi Reklam erezleri ve benzer teknolojiler

trans-unit.source: These are the cookies and similar technologies used at the date of this Policy to personalise your ads. Where available, we have also included a link to opt-out of the use of third-party cookies and similar technology on an individual level. You can do that by visiting the link in the table on each device you use to access Skyscanner.

seg-source.mrk: These are the cookies and similar technologies used at the date of this Policy to personalise your ads. Where available, we have also included a link to opt-out of the use of third-party cookies and similar technology on an individual level. You can do that by visiting the link in the table on each device you use to access Skyscanner.

target.mrk: Bunlar, bu Politikann hazrland tarihte reklamlarnz kiiselletirmek iin kullanlan erezler ve benzer teknolojilerdir. Uygun olduu durumlarda, nc taraf erezlerinin ve benzer teknolojilerin kullanmn bireysel dzeyde devre d brakmak iin bir balant da ekleriz. Skyscanner'a erimek iin kullandnz her cihazda tablodaki balanty ziyaret ederek bu ilemi yapabilirsiniz.

trans-unit.source: Skyscanner may also collaborate with other selected brands to understand more about our travelers' interests, for example, by identifying which Skyscanner travelers engage with particular third-party brands.

seg-source.mrk: Skyscanner may also collaborate with other selected brands to understand more about our travelers' interests, for example, by identifying which Skyscanner travelers engage with particular third-party brands.
